analysis.description:
BMGame.endRound (/unique_chucks/21/0x3e33166713a0410fe33e78f63c283364a7871979.sol#1111-1175) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! address(Banker_Address).send(_com) (/unique_chucks/21/0x3e33166713a0410fe33e78f63c283364a7871979.sol#1148-1152)
_eventData_ in BMGame.withdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0x3e33166713a0410fe33e78f63c283364a7871979.sol#523) is a local variable never initialiazed
_eventData_ in BMGame.reLoadKey (/unique_chucks/21/0x3e33166713a0410fe33e78f63c283364a7871979.sol#494-496) is a local variable never initialiazed
_prize in BMGame.core (/unique_chucks/21/0x3e33166713a0410fe33e78f63c283364a7871979.sol#913-914) is a local variable never initialiazed

BMGame.airdrop (/unique_chucks/21/0x3e33166713a0410fe33e78f63c283364a7871979.sol#1225-1244) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (seed - ((seed / 1000) * 1000)) < airDropTracker_ (/unique_chucks/21/0x3e33166713a0410fe33e78f63c283364a7871979.sol#1240-1244)
